subject: Sleep
title: You Can Train Yourself to Need Less Sleep
description: A 60-second lesson on You Can Train Yourself to Need Less Sleep.

hook.text: Many successful people claim they've trained themselves to sleep only four hours. Science says they're lying or lucky.

buildup.text: Sleep need is genetically determined. You can no more train away sleep need than train away hunger.

discovery.text: About one percent of people carry a rare DEC2 gene mutation that genuinely allows them to thrive on less sleep.

twist.text: The other 99 percent who claim to need less are accumulating hidden sleep debt that damages health silently.

climax.text: Research shows that people who think they've adapted to less sleep perform worse on cognitive tests than they realize.

punchline.text: You can't train away sleep need. You can only stop noticing the damage.

quiz.question: Can you train yourself to need less sleep?
options: No, sleep need is genetically determined and only 1% carry a short-sleep gene
Yes, after about two weeks of practice
